NPC.name: mage guildmaster
NPC.description: An old man peering through ancient tomes rests here.
NPC.longDescription: Your guildmaster stands here.
NPC.flags: NPC Sentinel Gain GuildMaster Mage NoPurge

NPC.name: cleric guildmaster
NPC.description: An older man wrapped in purple, long-flowing robes meditates here.
NPC.longDescription: Your guildmaster stands here.
NPC.flags: NPC Sentinel Gain GuildMaster Cleric NoPurge Fade

NPC.name: warrior guildmaster
NPC.description: A smaller man dressed in nothing but a tunic stands here waiting to train you.
NPC.longDescription: Your guildmaster stands here.
NPC.flags: NPC Sentinel Gain GuildMaster Warrior NoPurge AreaAttack

NPC.name: thief guildmaster
NPC.description: A small elf dressed in black rests in the corner. As you enter he grabs a knife an throws it at you. It lands the wall next to your left ear. We will now begin, is all he says.
NPC.longDescription: Your guildmaster stands here.
NPC.flags: NPC Sentinel Gain GuildMaster Warrior NoPurge

NPC.name: oldstyle receptionist
NPC.description: This arabian beauty is obviously the daughter of some high ranking official. As you attempt to sneak a peek under her veil you notice a small moon-shaped birthmark on her left cheek.
NPC.longDescription: A dark skinned, veiled woman greets you from behind the desk.

NPC.name: oldstyle bartender
NPC.description: He looks distracted as he pours five drinks at once without error.
NPC.longDescription: An old withered mage/bartender leans against the bar.
NPC.flags: NPC Sentinel Mage NoPurge Indoors AssistVnum Shopkeeper

NPC.name: oldstyle john brother singer lead
NPC.description: You see the lead singer of the Lokettes lip synching to an old Zeppelin tune.
NPC.longDescription: Brother John, lead singer for the Lokettes, stands on stage.

NPC.name: oldstyle panhandler
NPC.description: A small skinny man rests here hoping to find a warm heart.
NPC.longDescription: A panhandler rests here.

NPC.name: oldstyle panhandler
NPC.description: A small skinny man rests here staring at your clothes.
NPC.longDescription: A panhandler rests here.

NPC.name: oldstyle beggar
NPC.description: This poor soul seems down on his luck, perhaps you might spare a dime?
NPC.longDescription: A grubby beggar sits here in the filth.
NPC.flags: NPC Scavenger StayArea Wimpy Thief AssistVnum

NPC.name: oldstyle baker
NPC.description: You see a large man in a white apron covered in flour from head to toe.
NPC.longDescription: The baker stands here playing solitaire.
NPC.flags: NPC Sentinel NoPurge Indoors AssistVnum Shopkeeper

NPC.name: oldstyle shopkeeper
NPC.description: You see a half-elf sitting on a stool behind his counter.
NPC.longDescription: The shopkeeper stands here.
NPC.flags: NPC Sentinel NoPurge Indoors AssistVnum Shopkeeper

NPC.name: oldstyle Nabil shopkeeper
NPC.description: A large, well-fed shopkeeper, Nabil is adept at finding animals from all parts of the world. He welcomes you warmly and offers to show you a pair of priceless parrots.
NPC.longDescription: Nabil, purveyor of exotic pets, is waiting to serve you.

NPC.name: oldstyle ahkeem tailor
NPC.description: This middle-aged man looks over you with disdain and quickly suggests a new wardrobe.
NPC.longDescription: Ahkeem the tailor welcomes you to his store.
NPC.flags: NPC Sentinel NoPurge Indoors AssistVnum Shopkeeper

NPC.name: oldstyle vera
NPC.description: A tall slender elf stands before you smiling broadly.
NPC.longDescription: Vera the veggie lady beams as you look over her stand.
NPC.flags: NPC Sentinel NoPurge Indoors AssistVnum Shopkeeper

NPC.name: oldstyle butch
NPC.description: This stocky dwarf has a mad glint in his eye as he twirls his cleaver carelessly into the air.
NPC.longDescription: Butch the meatcutter stands here in his bloodied apron.
NPC.flags: NPC Sentinel Warrior NoPurge Indoors AssistVnum Shopkeeper

NPC.name: oldstyle abdul armorer
NPC.description: Abdul returns your gaze with a steady eye. You quickly glance away under his cold stare and place your order.
NPC.longDescription: Abdul stands here, waiting to help you.
NPC.flags: NPC Sentinel Warrior NoPurge Indoors AssistVnum Shopkeeper

NPC.name: oldstyle igor weaponsmith
NPC.description: You see a small dwarf with a large hump on his left shoulder.
NPC.longDescription: Igor stands here doing... something.
NPC.flags: NPC Sentinel Warrior NoPurge Indoors AssistVnum Shopkeeper

NPC.name: oldstyle cassandra
NPC.description: You see a happy weather-worn face whose lines suggest many years on the open sea. It is only through years of fishing that she is able to withstand the smell that permeates the air.
NPC.longDescription: Cassandra stands proudly over her selection.

NPC.name: oldstyle foreman man
NPC.description: A worried working dwarf stands here constantly making notes in his book and looking at his watch.
NPC.longDescription: The foreman stands here screaming at the workers.

NPC.name: oldstyle construction worker
NPC.description: A large sweaty looking man doesn't even return your glance.
NPC.longDescription: A construction worker steadily works here.

NPC.name: oldstyle statue
NPC.description: A magestic looking god stares at you with his deep-green eyes.
NPC.longDescription: The statue of Nati stands here.

NPC.name: oldstyle statue
NPC.description: Alander has been caught in the pose of casting a bolt of flame down to some hapless victim. He is dressed in the robes of a mage, yet bears a sword carved into the glittering stone of his statue.
NPC.longDescription: The statue of Alander stands here.

NPC.name: oldstyle statue
NPC.description: A statue of a stocky, angry looking dwarf with a cigarette in his mouth.
NPC.longDescription: The statue of Zump stands here.

NPC.name: oldstyle statue
NPC.description: A tall, swirling dark stone formed this statue. As you peer at him longer, it seems to chuckle.
NPC.longDescription: The statue of Nightshade stands here.

NPC.name: oldstyle statue
NPC.description: The statue of Satin, a small elven woman in mage robes, smiles serenely and her eyes twinkle with gentle humour. You take a step back in fear.
NPC.longDescription: The statue of Satin stands here.

NPC.name: oldstyle statue
NPC.description: This statue poses the Lady of the Mountains in a simple robe, with her long tresses sensibly pulled back from her smooth, smiling face.
NPC.longDescription: The statue of Shandra stands here.

NPC.name: oldstyle statue
NPC.description: A statue of Furey.
NPC.longDescription: There a statue of Furey standing here.
NPC.flags: NPC Sentinel Cleric Mage Warrior AssistVnum

NPC.name: oldstyle statue
NPC.description: Landru is carved from shimmering polished hematite, and a smile seems to flicker over his face. A pair of dice are enclosed in one hand.
NPC.longDescription: The statue of Landru stands here.
NPC.flags: NPC Sentinel Cleric Mage Warrior NoAlign Outdoors AssistVnum

NPC.name: oldstyle aziz
NPC.description: You see nothing special...
NPC.longDescription: Aziz the Human Canon stands here.
NPC.flags: NPC Scavenger StayArea Wimpy Cleric Mage AssistVnum

NPC.name: oldstyle mustafah
NPC.description: You see nothing special...
NPC.longDescription: Mustafah the Human Robber stands here.
NPC.flags: NPC Scavenger StayArea Wimpy Thief AssistVnum

NPC.name: oldstyle fatima
NPC.description: You see nothing special...
NPC.longDescription: Fatima the Elven Invoker stands here.
NPC.flags: NPC Scavenger StayArea Wimpy Mage NoAlign AssistVnum

NPC.name: oldstyle kareem
NPC.description: You see nothing special...
NPC.longDescription: Kareem the Dwarven Mercenary stands here.
NPC.flags: NPC Scavenger StayArea Wimpy Warrior Rescue AssistVnum

NPC.name: oldstyle nomad merchant
NPC.description: This robust fellow returns your gaze with a smile, but something inside tells you not to trust him very far.
NPC.longDescription: A nomad merchant looks you over.

NPC.name: oldstyle bodyguard
NPC.description: The large half-orc quickly glances you over and returns to his duties.
NPC.longDescription: A bodyguard sizes you up.

NPC.name: oldstyle kid thief
NPC.description: This small child sees you looking at him and quickly looks away.
NPC.longDescription: A skinny kid wanders around.

NPC.name: oldstyle dockworker
NPC.description: Although seemingly dull witted, this hulking mass carries the huge crates from the boats like so many lilies.
NPC.longDescription: A strong dockworker walks by moving crates.

NPC.name: oldstyle man tax collector
NPC.description: The city's tax collector walks from store to store collecting the Sultan's fee for living in his grand city.
NPC.longDescription: A small man walks around scribbling in a notebook.

NPC.name: oldstyle gord
NPC.description: You see nothing special.
NPC.longDescription: Gord the Rogue stands here.
NPC.flags: NPC Scavenger StayArea Thief Warrior NoAlign AssistVnum

NPC.name: oldstyle caramon
NPC.description: You see nothing special.
NPC.longDescription: Caramon the Knight stands here.
NPC.flags: NPC StayArea Warrior NoAlign Rescue AssistVnum

NPC.name: oldstyle raistlin
NPC.description: You see nothing special.
NPC.longDescription: Raistlin, the Arch-Magician stands here.
NPC.flags: NPC Scavenger StayArea Wimpy Mage AssistVnum

NPC.name: oldstyle curley greenleaf
NPC.description: You see nothing special.
NPC.longDescription: Curley GreenLeaf stands here.

NPC.name: oldstyle man wandering prophet
NPC.description: This sad case may have been an evangelist in another lifetime. He is known to stand on corners and accost passers-by with his doomsday preaching.
NPC.longDescription: A small grey-haired man walks around spouting gospel.

NPC.name: oldstyle alley cat feline
NPC.description: You see a small starved cat.
NPC.longDescription: A small harmless feline searches for food.

NPC.name: oldstyle vulture
NPC.description: As you look up at this bird, you see the only thing it wants is a corpse.
NPC.longDescription: A vulture circles above you.

NPC.name: oldstyle old man
NPC.description: He seems intent on winning.
NPC.longDescription: An old man sits here playing chess.

NPC.name: oldstyle conan librarian
NPC.description: The huge hulking mass rises as someone asks him a question.
NPC.longDescription: Coman the Librarian sits behind a desk.

NPC.name: oldstyle dirt devil
NPC.description: What you see before you is really a baby air elemental.
NPC.longDescription: The wind kicks up some dust.

NPC.name: oldstyle lamia
NPC.description: A half snake half woman creature rears back to attack you.
NPC.longDescription: A lamia stands here.
NPC.flags: NPC Scavenger Aggressive Mage Warrior AssistVnum

NPC.name: oldstyle dervish
NPC.description: This man looks like he could use a lot of rest.
NPC.longDescription: A raggety dervish stands here.

NPC.name: oldstyle sultan
NPC.description: You see a large wealthy man in red robes smiling at you.
NPC.longDescription: The Sultan rests here on his throne.

NPC.name: oldstyle harem girl
NPC.description: You see a dark skinned beauty, wearing almost transparent silks and light blue viel. Her loyalty to the sultan is unwavering.
NPC.longDescription: A lovely, veiled harem girl stands here.

NPC.name: oldstyle jailer
NPC.description: You see a pathetic soul lying here. Some ex-nobleman that has fallen out of grace with the Sultan.
NPC.longDescription: The Jailer sleeps here, snoring loudly.
NPC.flags: NPC Sentinel Scavenger Wimpy Warrior AssistVnum

NPC.name: oldstyle eunuch
NPC.description: You see a large man whose only duty is to protect the harem. He has been castrated for the ladies' safety.
NPC.longDescription: A eunuch stands here watching over the girls.

NPC.name: sultans favorite girl nichole
NPC.description: You see the most beautiful arabian girl that has ever met your eyes. Too bad she's about to kill you.
NPC.longDescription: Nichole, the sultan's favorite girl rests on a mound of pillows.

NPC.name: oldstyle allah
NPC.description: You see the all-knowing Allah.
NPC.longDescription: Allah is here.
NPC.flags: NPC Sentinel Cleric Mage Warrior NoAlign Outdoors AssistVnum

NPC.name: mage guild guard
NPC.description: This man looks like a mage/warrior, i wouldn't mess with him.
NPC.longDescription: The Guard for the Guild of Mages stand here.

NPC.name: priest guildguard
NPC.description: This man looks like a Priest, I wouldn't mess with him.
NPC.longDescription: The Guard for the Guild of Priests stands here.

NPC.name: warrior guild guard
NPC.description: The man looks like Conan's cousin, I wouldn't mess with him.
NPC.longDescription: The Guard for the Guild of Warriors stands here.

NPC.name: thief guild guard
NPC.description: You see a thief dressed all in black, he quickly stands as you enter and steps to bar your way. You notice his hands resting on two sheafs.
NPC.longDescription: The Guard for the Guild of theives stands here.

NPC.name: oldstyle servant boy
NPC.description: You see a small boy running around the halls of the palace.
NPC.longDescription: A servant boy is here running errands.

NPC.name: oldstyle sultans guard
NPC.description: You see a trained fighter, ready to help those in need.
NPC.longDescription: A guard stands here, protecting the innocent.
NPC.flags: NPC StayArea Wimpy Warrior Rescue AssistVnum

NPC.name: oldstyle sultans guard
NPC.description: You see a trained fighter, ready to defend the city.
NPC.longDescription: A guard stands here, watching the gate.
NPC.flags: NPC Sentinel StayArea Warrior Rescue AssistVnum

NPC.name: oldstyle sultans guard chief
NPC.description: You see a large man skilled in hunting and killing.
NPC.longDescription: The chief of the sultan's guard stands here.
NPC.flags: NPC Sentinel StayArea Warrior NoAlign AssistVnum

NPC.name: oldstyle mercenary
NPC.description: You see an assassin down on his luck looking to be freelanced out.
NPC.longDescription: A mercenary stands here waiting for a job.
NPC.flags: NPC Sentinel Warrior NoAlign Rescue AssistVnum

NPC.name: oldstyle shipwright captain
NPC.description: You see the shipwright of New Thalos, waiting to make someone a boat. He beams a smile at you through his beard as you walk in.
NPC.longDescription: An old captain rests here carving on a stick.
NPC.flags: NPC Sentinel NoPurge Indoors AssistVnum Shopkeeper

NPC.name: oldstyle blacksmith
NPC.description: You see a large human, dripping in sweat, standing before you. He takes a break from his swealtering work to bid you welcome.
NPC.longDescription: The blacksmith stands here pumping air into his fire.
NPC.flags: NPC Sentinel NoPurge Indoors AssistVnum Shopkeeper

NPC.name: oldstyle horse
NPC.description: You see one of the fine arabian beasts known about the land.
NPC.longDescription: A horse stands here.
NPC.flags: NPC Scavenger StayArea Wimpy NoAlign AssistVnum

NPC.name: oldstyle tourist
NPC.description: You see a small round japanese man, with a camera around his neck and a nose guard. He's looking at a small road map that he seems to be holding upside down.
NPC.longDescription: A tourist stands here looking lost.

NPC.name: oldstyle shelbye
NPC.description: You see nothing special.
NPC.longDescription: Shelbye stands here.

NPC.name: oldstyle cryohydra
NPC.description: A grey-brown reptillian creature with amber eyes stands before you.
NPC.longDescription: The cryohydra stands here.
NPC.flags: NPC Aggressive StayArea Warrior Outdoors AssistVnum

NPC.name: oldstyle giant minotaur lizard
NPC.description: A huge lizard like reptile with horns like a minotaur.
NPC.longDescription: The minotaur lizard stands here.

NPC.name: oldstyle dog death
NPC.description: A large two-headed hound barks at you viciously.
NPC.longDescription: The death dog stands here.

NPC.name: oldstyle lion spotted
NPC.description: A large fierce dapple skinned lion glares at you.
NPC.longDescription: The spotted lion stands here.

NPC.name: oldstyle behir
NPC.description: You see a large snake like reptile with more than a dozen legs.
NPC.longDescription: A behir slithers on the ground.

NPC.name: chimera creature
NPC.description: The chimera is still a mystery, better left unexplored. This creature has the hindquarters of a goat, the forepaws of a lion and the body of a red dragon.
NPC.longDescription: A creature with three heads stands here.

NPC.name: oldstyle couatl
NPC.description: A beautiful creature with the body of a serpent and feathered wings the color of the rainbow.
NPC.longDescription: A couatl hovers here.

NPC.name: oldstyle giant hornet
NPC.description: The giant hornet hits you very hard! You wish you wounds would stop BLEEDING so much!
NPC.longDescription: The giant hornet hovers here.

NPC.name: oldstyle pegasus
NPC.description: A magnificant winged steed, this horse looks much like the arabian thoroughbred you've seen in the stables.
NPC.longDescription: The pegasus stands here, flexing its wings.

NPC.name: oldstyle elvira
NPC.description: You see a very healthy female dressed in black, with long flowing hair to match her outfit.
NPC.longDescription: Elvira stands here mixing a love potion.
NPC.flags: NPC Sentinel Mage NoPurge Indoors Shopkeeper

NPC.name: oldstyle braheem
NPC.description: You see a powerful but slighty insane mage.
NPC.longDescription: Braheem stands here talking to the walls.
NPC.flags: NPC Sentinel Mage NoPurge Indoors AssistVnum Shopkeeper

NPC.name: oldstyle high priest
NPC.description: He does NOT look real happy that you have disturbed him.
NPC.longDescription: The high priest rests here meditating, well he WAS meditating.

NPC.name: oldstyle royal guard elite
NPC.description: You see one of the Royal Guards from Midgaard who seems to have gone through some training.
NPC.longDescription: An Elite Royal Guard stands here smiling happily.
NPC.flags: NPC StayArea Wimpy Warrior NoAlign Rescue AssistVnum

NPC.name: oldstyle patch bartender
NPC.description: You see a really big guy here who seems to have lost an eye in one manner or another.
NPC.longDescription: A large half-orc with a patch over one eye pours beer behind the counter
NPC.flags: NPC Sentinel Wimpy NoPurge Indoors AssistVnum Shopkeeper

NPC.name: oldstyle stitch
NPC.description: You see a small hobbit with his feet kicked up on his desk waiting for some sucker, um, customer to walk in his store.
NPC.longDescription: Stitch, the leather dude reclines in his chair.
NPC.flags: NPC Sentinel Wimpy NoPurge Indoors AssistVnum Shopkeeper

NPC.name: oldstyle gardener small elf
NPC.description: A young elf stands here in dirt covered overalls. He seems to be weeding his garden.
NPC.longDescription: A small elf stands here tending the garden.

NPC.name: oldstyle nightmare demon horse
NPC.description: You see the largest horse you have ever seen before. Standing 10' at the shoulder he breathes flame from his nostrils and leaps to protect his love.
NPC.longDescription: A large horse, black as night, stands here.
NPC.flags: NPC Sentinel StayArea Warrior NoAlign AssistVnum

NPC.name: oldstyle wolverine
NPC.description: You see a half wolf- half human beast wearing a glove with long thin blades on it.
NPC.longDescription: A large wolf like creature leaps out from the darkness.
NPC.flags: NPC Sentinel Warrior NoAlign Outdoors AssistVnum

NPC.name: oldstyle mimic painting
NPC.description: Boy is she ugly.
NPC.longDescription: You see an incredibly life-like painting of the Sultan's mother.

NPC.name: oldstyle mayor
NPC.description: You see a chubby hobbit dressed in his best suit.
NPC.longDescription: The Mayor of New Thalos stands here.

NPC.name: oldstyle chef
NPC.description: You see a very large human who seems to taste everything he makes.
NPC.longDescription: The chef stands here making dinner.

NPC.name: oldstyle ixitxachitl
NPC.description: You see a large ray with sharp fangs and a barbed tail.
NPC.longDescription: A very large ray with a wicked looking tail swims here.

NPC.name: oldstyle guard bodyguard
NPC.description: A big, strong, helpful, trustworthy guard.
NPC.longDescription: A bodyguard stands here.

NPC.name: healer
NPC.description: A man dressed in a pure white robes smiling happily at you - giving you cure from diseases. Although retired from adventuring, the healer still lends a hand. Type 'heal' to see a listing of spells.
NPC.longDescription: The healer stands here, selling spells.
NPC.affectedBy: DetectInvis DetectHidden Sanctuary Infrared ProtectEvil ProtectionGood DarkVision DetectIllusion

NPC.name: deathknight guildmaster
NPC.description: A knight dressed in dark armor waiting adepts for teach him a new torture methods.
NPC.longDescription: Your guildmaster is standing here.
